name: NightCare - 1974
description:
Gameplay

Your main goal is to INVESTIGATE  the 1974 kindergarten incident and record your findings along the way. Things do not go as planned... 1st person Retro Horror game

the original idea of the game was not fully created to see if the idea has potential, consider the game a demo

Some sounds from freesound.org were used in this game

my discord: https://discord.gg/B5T7VMFc

theme song creator: https://soundcloud.com/majinfeign
